title: okay, you guys need to promise me to keep quiet about this...
body:
i got a contact inside of riot games headquarter, the person have been able to collect some valuable information on the new champion to get release.

what this tells us is that the next champion to get released will be another support, the reason being riot is not happy with a large portion of the supports in the game, as they "doesn't fit the goal riot is trying to archive for the game".

my contact also managed to send the splash art for the champion:

    [img]https://i.imgur.com/BkzpPXy.jpg[/img]

replies.body: This support will be the Heart of Your Cards. +1 If you get the reference.

+1?!...sir, you out of you're mind...atleast +100 and 50 %...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u3K8VlxVLKo

Lol nice vid but I meant https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PJKFdPSYLMk

That's why you'll only get +50 AND YOU LOSE 7500 LIFe POIINTS WHILE ACTIVATING MY TRAP CARD(S) https://assets.bigcartel.com/product_images/210671065/Surprise+Trap+Card.jpg?auto=format&fit=max&w=1200
https://mtgcardsmith.com/view/complete/full/2018/2/21/1519232881789885.png
you son of a dragon ruler?!
But is he a Stand User though?
